comment.author: 40147761@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called CCC, Civilian Conservation Corps Photos, and we'd love to have this added to the group! OSU Library Archives, You have a wonderful collection of CCC photographs. I would love for you to enter them all in this group. So more people could find and enjoy this wonderful heritage of ours. Thank You Mona Loldwoman 11-17-09
